get.description: Get the account level, XP, and XP history for the current player. This endpoint only works with the authenticated player's PUUID.
Get the player's current loadout. Only works for your own PUUID.

items.description: Guns and knife. Note that the knife (ID: 2f59173c-4bed-b6c3-2191-dea9b58be9c7) does not have charm data (buddies).
Guns and knife. Note that the knife (ID: 2f59173c-4bed-b6c3-2191-dea9b58be9c7) does not have charm data (buddies).

get.description: Get a player's MMR and history
Get the match history for the given player
Get the details of a match after it ends

collisions.description: Float value of unknown significance. Possibly used to quantify how much the player was in the way of their teammates?

plantRoundTime.description: Time in milliseconds since the start of the round when the bomb was planted. 0 if not planted

defuseRoundTime.description: Time in milliseconds since the start of the round when the bomb was defused. 0 if not defused

gameTime.description: Time in milliseconds since the start of the game

roundTime.description: Time in milliseconds since the start of the round

damageItem.description: Item ID of the weapon used to kill the player. Empty string if the player was killed by the spike, fall damage, or melee.

roundResultCode.description: Empty string if the timer expired

gameTime.description: Time in milliseconds since the start of the game

roundTime.description: Time in milliseconds since the start of the round

damageItem.description: Item ID of the weapon used to kill the player. Empty string if the player was killed by the spike, fall damage, or melee.

get.description: Get recent games and how they changed ranking
Get the leaderboard for a given season
Get the matchmaking penalties for the given player
Get the config for the given player

LastApplication.description: Date in ISO 8601 format with sub-second precision

put.description: Get a player's name and tagline by their PUUID. Supports retrieving multiple players in one request.

get.description: Get the current store prices for all items
Get the currently available items in the store
Get the current wallet balance for the user
